title: Audit Workplace Safety (OSHA) Compliance
description: A compliance auditor performs a safety audit of a manufacturing plant.

tasks.description: Perform a physical walkthrough of the plant to identify any immediate safety hazards.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor observes that several emergency exits are partially blocked.

tasks.description: Review the plant's injury and illness logs to identify any trends.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor finds a high number of back injuries in the shipping department.

tasks.description: Verify that all forklift operators have a current, valid certification.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor reviews training records and confirms all operators are certified.
